data.note: This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill—the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill—you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes.
You see there is only one constant. One universal. It is the only real truth: Causality. Action, reaction. Cause and effect.
